Take a pretty little cot--                       Quite a miniature affair--                            Hung about with trellised vine,                  Furnish it upon the spot                       With the treasures rich and rare                            I've endeavoured to define.

original: Live to love and love to live--                       You will ripen at your ease,                            Growing on the sunny side--       You're a dainty man to please                            If you are not satisfied.
